name: The 5th Interaction
description:
The planet seems dead and everything tells you to leave. The skies are dark and deep. The cliffs are steep and deadly. The Hierophants want you dead, yet you have the boldness to get to their own motherland to find them.

Worst, you wield no other weapon than the one they gave you : The Quintessence.

The 5th Interaction is a First Person Parkour game set on Solace, a dead planet that displays monumental Temples where you will find new abilities. Use them to interact with the planet and get to its depths.

This Vertical Slice has been produced in 4 months by 12 students of the CNAM-ENJMIN
